repairedDockerfile:
FROM nginx:stable

# Install dependencies and then remove apt-get lists to save space
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y procps net-tools openssl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

COPY start.sh /
COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/
COPY nginx-secure.conf /etc/nginx/

RUN openssl dhparam -out /etc/ssl/private/dhparams.pem 2048
CMD /start.sh
